name: Ignus
info:
• 简体中文名: 伊格纳斯
  • 性别: 男
detail: There is a burning man hovering in the air over a grille in the Smoldering Corpse Bar. His skin bubbles and chars, and flames pour from his tormented eyes, yet his expression is far away, almost as if he were reveling in the flames.

jobs.name: Planescape: Torment Enhanced Edition
jobs.nameCn: 异域镇魂曲 增强版
